        The contructor of the ElectricCar class.
        It calls the calculateSellingPrice to calculate the selling price of the ElectricCar.

      • calculateSellingPrice

        public double calculateSellingPrice()
        Method to calculate and set the selling price of the ElectricCar. It calls the calculateSellingPrice method of the superclass Car.
        Electric cars cost an additional 20% of their base price.
        Specified by:
        calculateSellingPrice in interface ISellable
        Overrides:
        calculateSellingPrice in class Car
        Returns:
        the selling price of the car.
